example.name: no causer
example.text: `` [My husband]-1 was instantly impoverished [*-2]by the very act of [*]-1 marrying me , '' she says [*T*-1] .

example.name: with a causer
example.text: [GM officials]-1 also see a lot of potential in [*]-1 marrying Jaguar 's cars to the technological know-how of Group Lotus PLC , a British engineering and specialty car maker [0] GM bought [*T*-1] in 1986 .

example.name: marry into
example.text: While the company has always been family-run , Mr. Brawer is n't the first person [0] [*T*-1]to marry into the family and subsequently head Maidenform .
